Author: ourimagineforever
Text: I adore my food scale so much. I use it for *everything*. And as backwards as it sounds, I would actually eat a lot less (not that I eat a super healthy amount now lol) without it because it provides me with that reassurance and security as opposed to "well, I think I packed this cup of x loosely enough, hope I'm not over haha" and then logging cals for the cup plus 60% of another cup 'just in case'. In short, my food scale is my best friend.

Author: Eve_Lynx
Text: I like the sound of handling the present; even if I wanted to recover it wouldn't happen overnight, and we're still living in the present. It doesn't feel like an excuse and it isn't I'd say
